dcterms:description: Dataset generated by measuring the EM interactions between a metallic cylinder and the EM field radiated by a horn antenna, with data collected from various angular directions.
dcterms:title: rectTM_cent

dcterms:creator: K. Belkebir
M. Saillard
dcterms:description: Dataset generated by measuring the EM interactions between a metallic cylinder and the EM field radiated by a horn antenna, differing in the position of the object with respect to the center of the measurement system.
dcterms:title: rectTM_dece
